law.text: In addition to any other penalty prescribed in this chapter, the commission may institute in any court of competent jurisdiction, an action to prevent, restrain, correct or abate any violation of this chapter or of any zoning regulations adopted, or of any order or ruling made in connection with their administration or enforcement.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 64, effective March 25, 1960.
